name: Rise (itch) (ClrWtkns)
description:
As climate change reaches a tipping point, polar ice melts into the oceans causing sea levels around the globe to begin rising dramatically. As a robot, contact with water is fatal. Equipped with nothing but a jet pack, you fly ever upward to escape the always encroaching doom of the sea. How long will you survive? How high will you rise?

Made from scratch for the OLC::CodeJam 2021 using SDL2.
